# MonitorResolutionInfo Equality operator

Implements the equality operator (==).

```csharp
public static bool operator ==(MonitorResolutionInfo deviceInfo1, MonitorResolutionInfo deviceInfo2)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| deviceInfo1 | Operand 1 |
| deviceInfo2 | Operand 2 |

## Return Value

Returns true if `deviceInfo1` is equal to `deviceInfo2`; false otherwise.
